titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

action.text: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Vitter. Without written report.

bill.summary: Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship for the 114th Congress.
